title: Taddius
author: Taddius
content: Just a heads up that a new mineable coin very similar to Bitcoin has launched. Stohn Coin at www.stohncoin.org is now live and mineable by just about anyone. If you have extra mining capacity or are looking for a new coin to mine after ETH went off POW then check it out. We are building a community at https://discord.com/channels/1022184683913625721/1022184684668596347. Instructions to start mining are on the Stohn Coin website or you can join a Stohn Coin mining pool.

comments.author: miner29
comments.body: That is a joke of a white paper.  Go read all 2.5 pages of it.  No real details no real meat in it.  Just a generic few paragraphs about it.No real details just fluff.

comments.author: burugcrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Taddius on October 06, 2022, 05:09:46 PMJust a heads up that a new mineable coin very similar to Bitcoin has launched. Stohn Coin at www.stohncoin.org is now live and mineable by just about anyone. When we have bitcoin, why should anyone your coin? This project will dead in 6 months or less. Waste of mining resources, energy resources and TIME. No offense to you but you should have built something different. Or Should have just told launched a coin.

comments.author: Daodex
comments.body: It's not by force to build a proof of work project for miners, we are fine with ETH Pow and other right now we already have too many shit PoW coins like Stohn Coin, no more please.

comments.author: xandry
comments.body: "Add SOH to Marketplaces"  Are developers using some automated translation tools? They probably meant exchanges, but not marketplaces.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Like i said a couple of weeks back. When mining is very unprofitable. There are many possible scams popping up which are to trick honest miners in some way.The fact that this is a new account, its a coin I never heard of, the whitepaper is a joke, and very badly written.Until there is more confirmation about this, i would stay away.

comments.author: grendel25
comments.body: It is not about being bitcoin.  It is about being superior money which also means having a superior ecosystem. All sorts of links in my signature blocks."Thank me later"

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: New Bitcoin, the Next Bitcoin, the greener Bitcoin, The bitcoin twin... blah blah blahHonestly, what's the point of all these copy-cat coins? Isn't Bitcoin a few of its old forks enough?Do these developers think by being a bitcoin copycat or using the Bitcoin name, the coin will actually grow and surpass Bitcoin? Or the move is meant to fool Newbies into holding bags of a coin that may never live past 3 years?

comments.author: grendel25
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 10, 2022, 10:37:30 PMNew Bitcoin, the Next Bitcoin, the greener Bitcoin, The bitcoin twin... blah blah blahHonestly, what's the point of all these copy-cat coins? Isn't Bitcoin a few of its old forks enough?Do these developers think by being a bitcoin copycat or using the Bitcoin name, the coin will actually grow and surpass Bitcoin? Or the move is meant to fool Newbies into holding bags of a coin that may never live past 3 years?If Satoshi Nakamoto thought the same way about money there wouldn't be a bitcoin at all.If you haven't read "shelling out" by Nick Szabo, I highly recommend it. TLDR: humans have been inventing and reinventing money for hundreds and thousands of years. Cryptocurrencies are just the next iteration.I absolutely do want superior money. Bitcoin was an important next step but by no means the last.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: There's no reason for me to mine a crap coin like Stohn Coin, there's a big possibility I don't get anything since it's still not listed on exchange and no one want it. Currently Monero is still profitable to mine since the difficulty are decreased, I might consider to mine other top 50 crypto if Monero mining difficulty aren't profitable anymore.Anyway when you're linking your coins to Bitcoin, it's just show to everyone if it's a shitcoin.

comments.author: Taddius
comments.body: Stohn Coin is newly launched and I agree we have some work left to do ie: White Paper, but never less we have spent a lot of time creating this new mineable coin. Stohn allows people that missed the Bitcoin launch an opportunity to mine a coin with just a laptop or GPU card. Stohn Coin isn't a scam. Mine a few Stohn Coins and join the community as we try to build something from nothing. I appreciate your  viewpoints and feedback, but isnt every coin lauched today just an iteration of another coin or idea. Our goal is to build smart contract functionability onto Stohn Coin moving forward to offer something new that has value. There are tons of token coins that have been created in the past year but very few new mineable coins. If you believe that no other coin besides Bitcoin should exist then no new coins would have ever been developed. Launching Stohn Coin is just the first step in building a community and ecosystem that may or may not work out. By mining Stohn you risk very little except a little time and a very small amount of electricity. Building and launching a new coin is very difficult and time consuming. If you don't see any value in Stohn Coin please don't mine it and if you do then we would appreciate you joining our community.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Quote from: Taddius on October 11, 2022, 05:32:54 PMStohn Coin isn't a scam. Mine a few Stohn Coins and join the community as we try to build something from nothing. I appreciate your  viewpoints and feedback, but isnt every coin lauched today just an iteration of another coin or idea. Our goal is to build smart contract functionability onto Stohn Coin moving forward to offer something new that has value. Alright we will see that how Stohn Coin journey in the next year, will it be listed on centralized exchanges or it will become worthless since there's no volume on swap platform. I guess Stohn Coin journey would be end become dead coin without any volume, there's many coins out there have been linked with Bitcoin but it doesn't prove anything.Mining Stohn Coin just wasting electricity cost and time to set up the pools etc, not worth it.
